# *... in one of our current online studies:*

<br>

### **Verbal short-term memory**

**_Sighted and visually impaired participants welcome!_**

**Requirements:**

+ no hearing impairment

+ minimum age: 18 years

+ headphones and a real keyboard (does not work on tablet or phone)

+ [Link to English version](https://www.psytoolkit.org/c/3.1.0/survey?s=Jyv8q)

+ [Link to German version](https://www.psytoolkit.org/c/3.1.0/survey?s=5WN2M).


### **Auditory attention**

**Requirements:**

+ normal or corrected-to-normal vision

+ no hearing impairment

+ minimum age: 18 years

+ headphones and a real keyboard (does not work on tablet or phone)

+ [Link to English version](https://www.psytoolkit.org/c/3.1.1/survey?s=DGZSN) 

+ [Link to German version](https://www.psytoolkit.org/c/3.1.1/survey?s=Bzj4f).

### **Category learning**

**Requirements:**

+ normal or corrected-to-normal vision

+ ages 18-60 years

+ a real keyboard (does not work on tablet or phone)

+ [Link to experiment (English)](https://www.psytoolkit.org/c/3.3.0/survey?s=U9JpZ)

### **Sentence comprehension and attention**

**Requirements:**

+ English as a native language

+ no hearing impairment

+ ages: 18-60 years

+ [Link to experiment (English)](https://www.psytoolkit.org/c/3.2.0/survey?s=HjT9O)
